query.value:
select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2,3,4,5]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = to_char(now(),'YYYYMM')
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[1,2]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMM')
;

select BRAND_CODE as BRAND_CODE,  REQ_DATE, unnest(ARRAY[0,1,2,3,4,5]) as DATA_GBN 
from cd_ods.tb_fnb_month_brand_price_t
where data_gbn = '0'
and REQ_DATE = '202507'
;

query.value:
WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

source.query:
select case when coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1
            else coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as st
            ,
        case when coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1000
            else coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as ed
from cd_ods.tb_fsk_i0300 
where evl_yr  = '2025';

select case when coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1
            else coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as st
            ,
        case when coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1000
            else coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as ed
from cd_ods.tb_fsk_i0480
;

select case when coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1
            else coalesce (max(cast(st as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as st
            ,
        case when coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) = 0 then 1000
            else coalesce (max(cast(ed as numeric)), 0) + 1000
            end as ed
from cd_ods.tb_fsk_i0482 
;

query.value: select '1' as st, '1000' as ed , to_char(current_date - interval '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD') as cret_dtm;

WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

WITH vw_range AS (
    SELECT 
        (g * 1000 + 1) AS st,
        ((g + 1) * 1000) AS ed
    FROM generate_series(0, @{variables('total_count')}) AS g
)
SELECT r.st, r.ed
FROM vw_range r
;

with vw_range as
(
select generate_series(0,552) * 1000 + 1000001 as st, (generate_series(0,552)+1) * 1000 + 1000000 as ed
)
select st, ed from vw_range
where (st, ed) not in 
(select distinct cast(st as numeric), cast(ed as numeric) from cd_ods.tb_fsk_i2500_temp)
;
